name: Clothing Warehouse
text: It's a warehouse where a lot of cloth are stored for sell
pA: Used React-Router to turn the application into Single Page Application.
pB: Used Firebase for Authentication and Hosting, Heroku as Backend data hosting.
pC: Used React firebase hook for implement Email, Google, GitHub Login. Password Verification, Reset Password are added.

name: Computer Parts Manufacturer
text: Itâ€™s a parts manufacturer seller website. Where a lot of parts are available for wholesale sales.
pA: Used firebase hook for Authentication. Also used React-Router, React Query, Nested Routes, Axios for make website more user friendly.
pB: Stripe Payment Method, jwt to verify security and two different roles (admin, client) are implemented.
pC: Data are stored on MongoDB using crud operations with help of Express JS.

name: Wedding Photographer
text: This is a wedding photographer's website and details of what services he provides.
pA: Used Bootstrap as a CSS framework and Rechart for a graph view of services.
pB: Used React Firebase hook for implement Email, Google, GitHub Login.
pC: MongoDB for stored data and Express.js as a backend framework. Backend data are hosting on Heroku.

name: Bike Review
text: It's a Bike Review Website based on a bike.
pA: Use Bootstrap as a Components Library
pB: Graph View of Monthly sell, Investment Vs Revenue

name: Royal Convention Center
text: It's a Conventional Center for Wedding Arrangements
pA: Use Bootstrap to build Single Page Conventional Center
pC: Design as User Suitable Beautiful Single Page Application
